fields.name: startDate
fields.description: All events should have a start date. Dates should be in YYYY-MM-DD format. If the month or day are not available, these may be omitted.
fields.title: Start Date

fields.name: endDate
fields.description: Events or activities lasting more than one day should have either a duration (in months) or an end date. Dates should be in YYYY-MM-DD format. If the month or day are not available, these may be omitted.
fields.title: End Date

fields.name: duration
fields.description: Events or activities lasting more than one day should have either a duration (in months) or an end date.
fields.title: Duration (months)
